page.title: 04HOUSING IN SALPERTON
page.content: The whole village belongs to the Salperton Park Estate,so there is no present possibility of home ownership or private building.The last owner of the estate bought up 4 farms :Home Farm,Village Farm,Far Hill Farm and Crows Castle,and every other dwelling in the area.The present owner is landlord to 40 households .Of those in the village , 11 are dependent on the estate for their livelihood.7 houses are occupied by retired people .Three cottages are let as holiday homes and 5 on long-term tenancies.
